html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01702025-02-25DND
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to (1) reinstate the repealed rule requiring parties to give reasonable notice before a preliminary application or objection could be heard at courts martial; and (2) to a make a series of adjustements to French terminology for accuracy and to provide greater clarity in provisions directly related to the rule requiring reasonable notice.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to (1) reinstate the repealed rule requiring parties to give reasonable notice before a preliminary application or objection could be heard at courts martial; and (2) to a make a series of adjustements to French terminology for accuracy and to provide greater clarity in provisions directly related to the rule requiring reasonable notice.
